data.text: @willishl @Blavity I didn't want to go too deep into the Royal fam. I've known for awhile about P.P, comes from Greek aristocracy. Calling him pretty racist is a vast understatement.

@pagingdrswanson @Blavity ha! I actually asked myself the same question. I actually think the Queen would actually be ok with it. It's Prince Phillip, her husband, that I think would have an issue with it. He's pretty racist. Just google it. I would certainly like to know his reaction.
@Blavity Has anyone told Liz 2 that she's black? Just wondering
